text: hey I'm Gabe Kennedy we're here in
Brooklyn New York celebrating summer
with a wonderful dinner party we're
paying in studios one of my favorite
places on the planet Banyan studios is a
music recording studio and it moonlights
as a space for pop ups and cooking
events that I do and we are going to
have an incredible meal with some of my
best friends Andrew Chelsea Rose Jesse
Maddie
Devon Nicole Aaron who's also helping me
out and myself the menu is summer bounty
lots of colors lots of freshness lots of
vibrant foods and flavors so we have
some beautiful local heirloom tomatoes
we're gonna slice those nice and thin we
have a very diverse cheese board and a
few cured meats because everyone likes a
little cheese to me the highlight of the
dinner is these gorgeous little branzino
so we're gonna crisp them up in the pan
roast them in the oven with some burnt
citrus delectable we also have a granita
I took a little bit of unsweetened tea
lemon juice lime juice sweetened it up
with just a touch of honey laid it on a
pan and then every 30 minutes in the
freezer we go by with a fork and scrape
it and it creates these incredibly
textured ice shards we're gonna finish
it with some fresh herbs that we just
snipped from the window box out there
the granita will be a perfect refresher
after this wonderful communal meal it
feels really nice to be able to sit down
around the table and dive into the
abundance of summer it's not just what
you eat put it's who you be with and the
way that we can dine communally in the
way that we can share these experiences
with one another can be very powerful
and very beautiful
